description: The process of tattooing involves needles that move at very fast speeds to penetrate the outer layers of the skin.  The needles break the skin, and inject dots of ink into the third layer, creating the image of the tattoo design in the skin. Before you decide to get a tattoo, you should always take a little bit of time to talk to your tattoo artist.  When you speak to him, you should be sure to ask questions and find out anything you can about your new tattoo.  You should also find out information about his background, and other important bits of information that will assist you in moving forward with your decision. Read this book today and get all the information you need about tattoo designs, safety and so much more.
